translation.home.hero.title: Ithuluzi Lokuhlola Izikhala Zedijithali
translation.home.hero.subtitle: Ukunika Amandla Ama-Cooperative Ngokuguqulwa Kwedijithali
translation.home.hero.description: Ithuluzi elibanzi elenziwe yi-DGRV ne-BMZ ukusiza ama-cooperative ukulinganisa, ukuhlaziya, nokuvala izikhala zedijithali ngokuhlola okuhleliwe nezincomo ezingenziwa.
translation.home.features.title: Izici Eziyinhloko
translation.home.features.description: Konke okudingayo ukuze uqhube uhambo lwedijithali lwe-cooperative yakho.
translation.home.features.assessmentDescription: Ukuhlola okubanzi kuzo zonke izindlela eziyisi-8 ezibalulekile ukulinganisa izinga lakho lamanje lokuvuthwa kwedijithali.
translation.home.features.planningDescription: Chaza isimo sakho sedijithali esihlosiwe bese udala izinhlelo ezingenziwa ukuvala izikhala.
translation.home.features.trackingDescription: Bheka uhambo lwakho lokuguqulwa kwedijithali ngokuqhathanisa konyaka namamethrikhi okusebenza.
translation.home.benefits.title: Kungani Ukhethe Ithuluzi Lethu?
translation.home.benefits.empowermentDescription: Yakhelwe ngokukhethekile ama-cooperative e-Southern Africa nangaphandle.
translation.home.benefits.securityDescription: Ukuphepha kwezinga lebhizinisi ngokugcinwa kwedatha efihliwe namakhophi ayisipele ajwayelekile.
translation.home.benefits.accessibilityDescription: Isebenza ku-inthanethi naku-inthanethi, ilungiselelwe izindawo ezinomkhawulo webhendi.
translation.home.partners.title: Yakhelwe Ngokusekelwa yi
translation.home.partners.bmzDescription: UMnyango Wobumbano Lwezomnotho Nokuthuthukiswa Kwezwe waseJalimane
translation.home.cta.title: Usulungele Ukuguqula I-Cooperative Yakho?
translation.home.cta.description: Qalisa uhambo lwakho lokuguqulwa kwedijithali namuhla futhi uvule amathuba amasha okukhula nokusebenza kahle.
translation.onboarding.step1.title: Hlola Izinga Lakho Lamanje Le-
translation.onboarding.step1.description: Hlola ngokushesha ukuthi ikhophelo lakho likuphi namuhla ohambweni lwayo lokuguqulwa kwedijithali.
translation.onboarding.step2.title: Chaza Izinhloso Zakho Zesikhathi Esizayo
translation.onboarding.step2.description: Setha umbono wakho wezinga lokuguqulwa kwedijithali ofuna ukulifinyelela bese udala umhlahlandlela wakho.
translation.onboarding.step3.title: Hlaziya Imiphumela &
translation.onboarding.step3.description: Thola izincomo eziqondene nawe namasu asebenzisekayo ukuze uqhube ikhophelo lakho phambili.

translation.adminDashboard.managementTools.title: Amathuluzi Okuphatha
translation.adminDashboard.managementTools.descripti: Finyelela izingxenye ezahlukahlukene zesistimu ukuze uziphathe.
